verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Athalia \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ochozias \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* slew \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* Josaba \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*, \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ochozias, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* Joas \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ochozias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* slain, \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bedchamber \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Athalia, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* slain.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Athalia \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w* seat, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* centurions \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H3967"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, shewed \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* must \w do|strong="H6213"\w*:

Let \w a|strong="H8104"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* go \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sabbath, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* let \w a|strong="H8104"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Sur|strong="H5495"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* let \w a|strong="H8104"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w part|strong="H7992"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dwelling \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* shieldbearers: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Messa.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* let \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w parts|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* compass \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w*, \w having|strong="H1961"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* precinct \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* temple, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* slain: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* centurions \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w according|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spears|strong="H2595"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* arms \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w having|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w diadem|strong="H5145"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* clapping \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*. \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0559"\w* save \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Athalia \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* tribunal, \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* singers, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8056"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* sounding \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* rent \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*: \w A|strong="H7200"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w*, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w* commended \w the|strong="H0853"\w* centurions \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H2428"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* precinct \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* whosoever \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* slain \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* slain \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thrust \w her|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* she \w was|strong="H4428"\w* slain \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w broke|strong="H7665"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w images|strong="H6754"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w broke|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* \w thoroughly|strong="H3190"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* Mathan \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w guards|strong="H6486"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* centurions, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Cerethi \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Phelethi, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shieldbearers \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*. \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*: \w but|strong="H4191"\w* Athalia \w was|strong="H0776"\w* slain \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
Now Joas was seven years old, when he began to reign.
